scripts.dev:start: yarn project:init && node --import tsx --conditions=monorepo --watch src/index.ts -- musetric-backend
scripts.docker:build:cpu: docker build --progress=plain -f Dockerfile.runtime --build-arg variant=cpu -t musetric-runtime-cpu ../.. && docker build --progress=plain -f Dockerfile --build-arg RUNTIME_IMAGE=musetric-runtime-cpu -t musetric-cpu ../..
scripts.docker:build:cuda: docker build --progress=plain -f Dockerfile.runtime --build-arg variant=cuda -t musetric-runtime-cuda ../.. && docker build --progress=plain -f Dockerfile --build-arg RUNTIME_IMAGE=musetric-runtime-cuda -t musetric-cuda ../..
